definition: Tumen county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals
Tumen river in Jilin province 吉林省, forming the eastern border between China and North Korea
Tumen county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin

sentences.english: North Koreans keep on wading the Tumen River.
sentences.chinese: 不過朝鮮人並未被嚇阻，他們繼續涉過圖們江。

sentences.english: V. Accelerating development of the Tumen River area and promoting overall cooperation in Northeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 加快圖們江區域開發，推進東北亞全面合作。

sentences.english: The border zone along the Tumen River became the main crossing point for refugees fleeing into China, and for smuggling Chinese goods back into North Korea.
sentences.chinese: 大批難民跨越圖們江湧向中國，或走私中國貨到朝鮮。

sentences.english: Under the new circumstances, the regional development of the Tumen River area is especially important.
sentences.chinese: 在新形勢下，圖們江區域合作開發工作尤爲重要。

sentences.english: In the near future , the Russian Tumen River Region Negotiation Conference will also be held in Vladivostok.
sentences.chinese: 近期還將在海參崴舉行俄羅斯圖們江地區招商會。

sentences.english: The State Council has approved a border development zone in the Tumen River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 國務院已同意在圖們江流域設立邊境發展區。

sentences.english: Russian Tumen River Region Negotiation Conference will also be held in Vladivostok.
sentences.chinese: 近期還將在海參崴舉行俄羅斯圖們江地區招商會。

sentences.english: Tumen Peoples Hospital has gained great changes in eight years.
sentences.chinese: 吉林省圖們市人民醫院八年來取得了巨大變化。
